kannada_original: ಮಾತು ಚಿಂತನೆ ಮೂಲ, ಹೊಸತು ಕಲ್ಪನೆ ಗ್ರಾಸ ;
english_transliteration: mātu cintane mūla, hosatu kalpane grāsa;
english_translation: Speech is the origin of thought, the food for new imagination.
The representation of priority is in the word structure/description.

kannada_original: ಲಲಿತ ರೀತಿಯ ನೆಲಸು ಈ ಶಬ್ದ ವಿನ್ಯಾಸ
english_transliteration: lalita rītiya nelasu ī śabda vinyāsa
english_translation: This word arrangement is the dwelling place of delicate manner.
Speech is the experience of the mind – Muddu Rama.
